title: Optimizing Modern JavaScript Performance
author: Maria Oto
summary: Practical tips for keeping your web apps fast and responsive in 2026.
content:
Performance is the core of user retention. A slow app is a failed app. Here's how we optimize JavaScript today.

## Tree Shaking and Native Modules
With browser support for native ES modules being universal, we've moved away from heavy bundlers in many cases. Native code is almost always faster.

## Edge Computing
Moving logic from the browser to the edge (Cloudflare Workers, etc.) has drastically reduced the amount of JS that needs to be executed on the client side.
